entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
